name: Just the Bookmarks, Please
description: Gets rid of everything out of the standard Bookmarks menu bar (the Bookmarks dropdown menu in the main Firefox toolbar), except for the actual contents of the bookmarks menu.
additional_info: Combined with Add Bookmark HereÂ² (https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/add-bookmark-here-2/) you can easily drop new bookmarks into the "Bookmarks Menu" rather than the "Unsorted Bookmarks" folder, and they, and only they, will show up in the BMB toolbar dropdown.
